channel.title: 667/*** Slayer
channel.description:
hey , could some1 tell me how to make all monsters give certain amount of slayer xp like crabs gives 1k xp , nex 100k xp and so.. because my slayer doenst work as i get a task but it dont give xp as i kill the target because it dont count the kill
thanks,
